Donna Auguste (amụrụ na afọ 1958) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke Amerịka, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye enyemaka
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa, ya na onye ọrụ ibe John Meier, na onye isi ọrụ (CEO) nke Freshwater Software site na afọ 1996 ruo afọ 2000
Tupu ịmalite Freshwater Software, Auguste bụ onye isi njikwa injinia na Apple Computer onye nyere aka ịhazi mmepe nke Newton personal digital assistant (PDA)
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye isi nduzi maka US West Advanced Technologies, ebe ọ zutere John Meier wee malite iche echiche nke ọma banyere ịmepụta Freshwater Software
Na afọ 2000, o rere Freshwater Software nye Mercury Interactive Corp
maka $147 nde
N'otu afọ ahụ, a ghọtara ya dị ka otu n'ime "ụmụ nwanyị iri abụo na ịse na-eme ka ọ buru ibu na obere azụmahịa" site na Fortune Magazine
Ọ nwetakwara onyinye nturu ugo ọla edo nke afọ 2001 maka nwanyị pụtara ìhè na teknụzụ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na agụmakwụkwọ maka Ph.D
na Mahadum Colorado Boulder, Auguste nwetara aha "onye injinia a ma ama" nke sitere na ọha injinia kacha ochie na-asọpụrụ obodo, Tau Beta Pi
A mụrụ Donna Auguste na Texas mana ọ kwagara Louisiana wee gaa California ebe ọ gara kọleji
Ọ bụ nne ha zụrụ ya na ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị anọ
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ nwata, Auguste na-enwe mmasị iji ngwá ụlọ na-emekọ ihe
Ọ na- ewepụtakarị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ wee kwakọba ngwa eletriki ndị ọzọ iji ghọta makaniiki dị n'azụ ka ha si arụ ọrụ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ debanyere aha na mmemme injinịa eletriki na sayensị kọmputa (EECS) na Mahadum California, Berkeley ebe ọ meriri ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi iji nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor nke sayensị na Electrical Engineering na Kọmputa Sayensị
N'ịbụ onye na-aga mmemme nwere nnukwu mkpokọta nke ndị ọgbọ nwoke, Auguste na-achụpụkarị ma na-eleda ya anya site n'aka ndị ọrụ ibe ya
Auguste gara n'ihu bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America mbụ ga-aga mmemme PhD na Mahadum Carnegie-Mellon
Mgbe ọ na-eme nyocha na sayensị etinyere na ọgụgụ isi na Mahadum Carnegie-Mellon, Auguste etinyere na Xerox Corporation 's Palo Alto Research Center wee zute ndị malitere IntelliCorp n'ọdịnihu
IntelliCorp goro Auguste ka onye injinia sọftụwia na 1986 ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ngwaahịa teknụzụ jikọtara ọgụgụ isi
Mgbe Auguste nọrọ afọ anọ na IntelliCorp, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ruo ọnwa abụọ iji jiri igwe kwụ otu ebe gafere n'ime ime obodo Japan
Mgbe ọ lọghachiri, Apple Kọmputa goro Auguste na 1990 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa ngwanrọ ngwanrọ maka ọrụ mmepe Newton PDA
Mgbe ọ nọ na Apple Kọmputa, Auguste nwere mmasị na ya ma nweta otuto maka nkà njikwa ya yana onyinye ọrụ aka (o jidere patent dị iche iche maka ọrụ ya na Newton PDA)
Na 1996, Auguste kwagara Boulder, Colorado wee sonye na US West Advanced Teknụzụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke injinia na mmepe sistemu ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ngwa telivishọn mmekọrịta maka netwọk netwọk fiber-optic nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Auguste buru ụzọ hụ na ịntanetị nwere ike ma mesịa malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya: Freshwater Software Inc., onye na-enye ngwọta ngwanrọ maka idowe na nyochaa ngwa weebụ dị mkpa nke azụmahịa

Software Freshwater tolitere ngwa ngwa site na obere mmalite gaa na onye na-eweta sọftụwia ọtụtụ nde dollar nke mba nke turu ọnụ ndị ahịa Fortune 500 dị ka Alta Vista, IBM, Microsoft, Go.com, na Merrill Lynch
Emechara zụta Freshwater Software site na Mercury Interactive Corp
nke California maka nde $147 na 2001

Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nka ka ire Freshwater Software, Auguste mepere ntọala Leave a Little Room, LLC, otu ọrụ enyemaka na-enyere aka inye ụlọ, ọkụ eletrik na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa nye obodo ndị ogbenye na ndị nwere nsogbu gburugburu ụwa

N'afọ 2009, e nyere Auguste $750,000 sitere na Santa Clara County dị ka nkwụsị maka imeri nkwubi okwu dị elu sitere na ụzọ aghụghọ nke onye ọka iwu si n'ọfịs onye ọka iwu mpaghara jiri mee ihe n'okwu mpụ ebe a na-enyocha ụlọ Auguste's Colorado n'ihe metụtara ya
Mkpebi idina nwa nwanne Damon Auguste nke e mechara kagbuo
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik na onye otu Cure d'Ars Parish na Denver
